title: Video: Fear Of Men – Seer
body:
It would have been hard to imagine how big **Fear of Men** were set to become when they emerged in 2011, not because of the quality of the music, more because it’s hard to believe that the world would have been so taken with this longing, heartbroken brand of guitar pop.

With high-profile SXSW shows in the pipeline this year, the band have dropped this sombre new video for Seer, their new single. The whole things comes across as a depressive re-interpretation of that Dirty Projectors short film we were treated to last year, in a good way mind.
